00001 #ifndef __RenderModel_h_
00002 #define __RenderModel_h_
00003 
00004 #include <Ogre.h>
00005 #include <vector>
00006 #include <sstream>
00007 #include "GameObjects.h"
00008 
00009 using namespace Ogre;
00010 
00011 /**
00012  * A RenderObject represents a single logical object from the game model
00013  * that should be rendered to screen. The RenderObject combines a reference
00014  * to the PhysicsObject of the model with a reference to the root sceneNode
00015  * that should be used to render the entity through OGRE.
00016  */
00017 class RenderObject
00018 {
00019 private:
00020     /** A pointer to the model object */
00021     PhysicsObject * mp_object;
00022 
00023     /** A pointer to the root scene node used to render the object */
00024     SceneNode * mp_node;
00025 public:
00026     /** Constructs a new RenderObject */
00027     RenderObject(PhysicsObject * object, SceneNode * node);
00028 
00029     /** Updates the node based on passed time and camera orientation (useful for sprites) */
00030     void updateNode(Real elapsedTime, Quaternion camOrientation);
00031 
00032     /** @return A pointer to the model object */
00033     PhysicsObject * getObject();
00034 
00035     /** @return A pointer to the root scene node used to render the object */
00036     SceneNode * getRootNode();
00037 };
00038 
00039 /**
00040  * The RenderModel stores the complete list of RenderObjects that should be rendered each frame
00041  * for a scene.
00042  */
00043 class RenderModel : public GameArenaListener
00044 {
00045 private:
00046     /** Reference to the GameArena object that should be observed */
00047     GameArena & m_model;
00048 
00049     /** List of all RenderObjects that should be updated and rendered each frame */
00050     std::vector<RenderObject> m_renderList;
00051 
00052     /** The SceneManager for the scene represented by the RenderModel */
00053     SceneManager * mp_mgr;
00054 
00055     /** Counter used to ensure entities are generated with unique identifiers */
00056     int m_entityIndex;
00057 
00058 public:
00059     /**
00060      * Constructs a RenderModel which observes the specified GameArena, and creates
00061      * scene nodes through the passed SceneManager.
00062      */
00063     RenderModel(GameArena& model, SceneManager * mgr);
00064 
00065     /**
00066      * Generates a RenderObject to represent the passed PhysicsObject, and adds it to the render list 
00067      */
00068     void generateRenderObject(PhysicsObject * object);
00069 
00070     /**
00071      * Searches the render list for a RenderObject representing the passed object, and deletes it if
00072      * it exists.
00073      */
00074     void destroyRenderObject(PhysicsObject * object);
00075 
00076     /** Calls the updateNode() method of all RenderObjects stored in the RenderModel's render list */
00077     void updateRenderList(Real elapsedTime, Quaternion camOrientation);
00078 
00079     /** Called whenever a new PhysicsObject is created by the observed GameArena */
00080     virtual void newPhysicsObject(PhysicsObject * object);
00081 
00082     /** Called whenever a PhysicsObject is destroyed by the observed GameArena */
00083     virtual void destroyedPhysicsObject(PhysicsObject * object);
00084 };
00085 
00086 #endif
